## Installation

You can install the development version of faireR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("ssusnea/faireR")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
#| message: false
library(dplyr)
library(faireR)
# Compute fairness measures for baseball
csas25 |>
  group_by(stand) |>
  fairness_cube()
```
